data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Parasapyga Turner (Hymenoptera, Sapygidae), with the description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article van Achterberg, Cornelis (2014): Revision of the genus Parasapyga Turner (Hymenoptera, Sapygidae), with the description of two new species. ZooKeys 369: 61-77, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.369.6691, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.369.6691
